# Navigate by quire and page



## Overview

Select a volume, quire and page to see a page image linked to pannable/zoomable view. Optionally see a tabular summary of the quire's structure with thumbnail images linked to an image viewer.

## Notebook

- [HTML version](./codex-browser.html) (readable in a web browser)
- [Pluto notebook](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/neelsmith/complutensian-texts/refs/heads/main/pluto/physical-artifact/codex-browser.jl) (download and open in Pluto)
